name: 謝金雲
objective: 本科目介紹作業系統之基本觀念、設計、實作方法。主要內容包括：1. 作業系統之演進 2. 程序與執行序 3.平行程序之特性4.同步機制5. 虛擬記憶體 6. 分散式系統 7.分散式同作控制 8. 檔案架構與管理9.磁碟管理與資料存取10. 排程模式 11. 系統及網路安全
schedule:
Week 1: Computer system overview
Week 2: OS overview and process concepts
Week 3: Process control
week 3: Mutual exclusion
Week 4: Mutual exclusion and synchronization
Week 5: Deadlock
Week 6: Starvation
Week 7: Real memory management
Week 8: Virtual memory management
Week 9: Virtual mamory management
Week 10: Uniprocessor scheduling
Week 11: Processor scheduling algorithms
Week 12: Multiprocessor and re4al-time scheduling
Week 13: I/O management
Week 14: Disk scheduling
Week 15: File management
Week 16: Distributed systems and security
Week 17: Distributed processing
Week 18: Distributed process management
scorePolicy:
Midterm: 20% * 2
Final exam: 40%
Homework and attendance: 20%
